about_the_game:
Wanna Furry Heroes concepts in HD and its sketches in your pocket?



This pack contains Furry Heroes concept arts and its sketches. Check the whole development process before the final version! Also, you can use the concepts to make your wallpapers and/or have fun without having to access the game. In other words, you'll get:


  • 6 Clothed Characters in HD resolution WITHOUT background;
  • 5 Naked Characters in HD resolution WITHOUT background;
  • 12 Sketches);

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Furry Heroes\Adult Art Pack

content_descriptors.notes: It contains partial and full male nudity and male masturbation.
